NevaVendor

Supported devices: J701, J710, J530, J730, J600, G610, A320

Changelog:
- Vendor from J600G device
- Ares Kernel V8 implemented
- Performance boosting tweaks
- Pro audio tweaks
- GPU and CPU capped to 60 FPS
- Galaxy S9+ OMC
- Stock device model for each devices
- Rounded corners
- Cast (Smartview) fixes added for several ROMs
- Reboots when recording video at 16:9 fixed
- More for you to explore
- And Many more
